name: slime-slasher
description: Slime Slasher is a simple dexterity game where the player must choose the correct attack to defeat the enemy in a limited time. It has the astethic of a turn-based jrpg (Pokemon-like for the uninitiated). Here is an example of the gameplay loop:  - A  green slime (an enemy) apears on the screen! - A timer is started - You click one of three attacks (red, green, or blue) - If you clicked red you Defeated the Slime!    - You recieve Gold (plus a bonus for remaining time on the clock!)   - A new Slime of a Random Color is loaded in and the timer resets - If you choose the wrong attack (blue or green) or miss the time, its the slimes turn!   - Slime will take one of your lives and you will then have another chance to attack.
